data.fullContent: I worked for a hotel in New York City. My shift was supposed to start at 8 a.m., but I was running late. I had gone to the gym at six because I had to work out early. I got to work at 7:55 a.m. and realized that the elevator wasn't working. I had no choice but to run up about fourteen flights of stairs. While running up the stairs, I tripped and fell. This was one of the worst days of my life. I rushed to my office and barely made it on time.

q1.translation: 我在纽约的一家酒店工作。我的班应该在早上8点开始，但是我迟到了。我六点钟去了健身房，因为我得早点锻炼。我早上7:55到公司，发现电梯坏了。我别无选择，只能跑上大约十四层楼梯。

options.sentence: After work, I go back to my apartment again.
